bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dian xie 癲邪 , peak-illness evil. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai he quoting Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 : 安心定膽，益志，養五藏，治癲邪 , “It pacifies the heart and stabilizes the gallbladder, benefits the mind, nourishes the five depots, and cures peak-illness evil”, writes: 安心定膽，益志，養五藏，治顛邪 , “It pacifies the heart and stabilizes the gallbladder, benefits the mind, nourishes the five depots, and cures peak[-illness] evil ”.
